history.narrative: Law 18-227, the “Priority Sidewalk Assurance Act of 2010”, was introduced in Council and assigned Bill No. 18-191, which was referred to the Committee on Public Works and Transportation. The Bill was adopted on first and second readings on June 1, 2010, and June 15, 2010, respectively. Signed by the Mayor on July 7, 2010, it was assigned Act No. 18-471 and transmitted to both Houses of Congress for its review. D.C. Law 18-227 became effective on September 24, 2010.
